div.head: 陽事不起
div.div: failure of the yang thing to rise

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: failure of the yang thing to rise

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yin wei 陰痿 , dysfunction of the yin [member, i.e. penis]. Pu ji fang 普濟方 卷 219: 治臟腑虛冷，元陽正氣虛弱，陽事不起 , “It cures conditions such as depletion cold affecting the depots and palaces, depletion weakness of original yang and proper qi, and failure of the yang thing to rise ”. Yang shi bu xing 陽事不行 , failure of the yang thing to act [1]

Pathological Condition identical with yin wei 陰痿 , dysfunction of the yin [member, i.e. penis]. Shi yi xin jing 食醫心鏡 Substance Entry yang shen 羊腎：主下焦虛冷，脚膝無力，陽事不行 , “It controls depletion cold affecting the lower burner, lack of strength in legs and knees, and failure of the yang thing to act ”.
